core.text: And finally we have the status area. when enabled, the status readouts display the state of various registers. By color: cyan: instruction, green: data, red violet: ram bank (A-F), blue violet: thread, pink: register 1, orange: register 2, blue: execution address. These are disabled by default outside the main menu, but can be toggled with F4 and enabled in the USERBOOT.CFG file in the VMUSER directory. also you will see the CPU status LED; cyan=on, orange=standby, and the step-by- step mode LED. Again, The users manual goes into more detail.
